newsitem.title: USA: Gensym says hires Richard Darer as CFO.
newsitem.headline: Gensym says hires Richard Darer as CFO.

text.p: Gensym Corp said Thursday it appointed Richard M. Darer, formerly of White Pine Software Inc, as vice president of finance and administration and chief financial officer, effective April 10, 1997.

Gensym also announced the resignation of vice president of technology and founder Michael Levin, and the resignation of the vice president of the Manufacturing Business Unit, Andrew J. Zoldan. Gensym President Robert Moore has assumed responsibilities for the Manufacturing Business Unit.

In addition the company said, William H. Wood, formerly of Integrated Systems Management, a division of Groupe Bull, has joined as vice president and general manager of Gensym's Communications Business Unit.
The company was not immediately available for comment.
